guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"a7nkq","text":"Onepot-seq is single cell RNA sequencing(scRNA-seq) experiment method.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5fge9","text":"The main idea of Onepot-seq is to do single cell experiment in continuous medium without compartmentalization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"s8kv","text":"Therefore, we focus on temperature control and not disturbing the solutions due to transient mRNA localization.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bd4tm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bcum","text":"Onepot-seq references.title: Highly Parallel Genome-wide Expression Profiling of Individual Cells Using Nanoliter Droplets.
references.authors: Macosko EZ, Basu A, Satija R, Nemesh J, Shekhar K, Goldman M, Tirosh I, Bialas AR, Kamitaki N, Martersteck EM, Trombetta JJ, Weitz DA, Sanes JR, Shalek AK, Regev A, McCarroll SA

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.section: Cells and beads preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ejrr","text":"Suspend cells in PBS (1,000 cells/μl of concentration is recommended)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Cells and beads preparation
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dj7f6","text":"Suspend beads in incubation buffer (20,000 beads in   incubation buffer)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8nri9","text":"(incubation buffer : 6% Ficoll PM-400, 20mM EDTA, 0.2M Tris pH 7.5)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"05D6DB83BC5C11ECAF160A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7t8ir","text":"Run PCR following the protocol below:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f99au","text":" steps.section: Cell lysis and beads isolation (※ Do experiments in 4C room)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"22fo9","text":"If multiple wells or larger area wells are used to increase the number of cells, collect beads corresponding to 5,000 cells in one falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3n1qd","text":"(RT mix is effective up to 5,000 cells)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
